feed.title: Password Pusher Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.45.4: Fix Custom Locale on Pushes
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

  • Pass locale through preliminary step (#2444) Thanks @mathsyx69 for reporting!

:rocket: Features

  • Latest Language Strings (#2439) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump actionmailbox from 7.2.0 to 7.2.1 (#2458) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump activemodel from 7.2.0 to 7.2.1 (#2459) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump brakeman from 6.1.2 to 6.2.1 (#2456) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump actiontext from 7.2.0 to 7.2.1 (#2457) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump rails from 7.2.0 to 7.2.1 (#2455) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump activesupport from 7.2.0 to 7.2.1 (#2454) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump activestorage from 7.2.0 to 7.2.1 (#2453) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump activerecord from 7.2.0 to 7.2.1 (#2451) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump actionview from 7.2.0 to 7.2.1 (#2452) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.967.0 to 1.968.0 (#2450) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump activejob from 7.2.0 to 7.2.1 (#2445) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump rexml from 3.3.5 to 3.3.6 (#2442) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.966.0 to 1.967.0 (#2441) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-s3 from 1.158.0 to 1.159.0 (#2440) @dependabot

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

@dependabot, @dependabot[bot] and @pglombardo

:motor_boat: Docker Images

Available on Docker Hub: https://hub.docker.com/r/pglombardo/pwpush

:running_man: Run This Version

bash docker run -d -p 5100:5100 pglombardo/pwpush:1.45.4

..and go to http://localhost:5100

  • Documentation

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.45.5: Add Sentry for APM
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

  • Fix environment variables in comments for syllables_count (#2460) @daha

:rocket: Features

  • Add Sentry for APM (#2461) @pglombardo

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.45.6: Add New Maintenance Mode
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

This release add the ability to turn on maintenance mode for the application.

Documentation has been added here.

:rocket: Features

  • Add ability to set maintenance mode (#2476) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-core from 3.202.0 to 3.202.1 (#2473) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump thor from 1.3.1 to 1.3.2 (#2472) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.968.0 to 1.969.0 (#2470) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump highline from 3.1.0 to 3.1.1 (#2469) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump net-imap from 0.4.14 to 0.4.15 (#2468) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-core from 3.201.5 to 3.202.0 (#2467) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump google-cloud-env from 2.1.1 to 2.2.0 (#2466) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump rubocop-rails from 2.25.1 to 2.26.0 (#2464) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump google-apis-storage_v1 from 0.43.0 to 0.44.0 (#2463) @dependabot

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

@dependabot, @dependabot[bot] and @pglombardo

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.45.8: Updated Doc Links, Dependency & Security Updates
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

  • Documentation & Links Cleanup (#2528) @pglombardo
  • Add Overcommit for local development (#2529) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-core from 3.205.0 to 3.206.0 (#2527) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sigv4 from 1.9.1 to 1.10.0 (#2526) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.974.0 to 1.976.0 (#2524) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump reviewdog/action-brakeman from 2.16.0 to 2.17.0 (#2523) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump i18n from 1.14.5 to 1.14.6 (#2521) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump jwt from 2.8.2 to 2.9.0 (#2520) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump jbuilder from 2.12.0 to 2.13.0 (#2519) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump unicode-display_width from 2.5.0 to 2.6.0 (#2517) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump turbo-rails from 2.0.6 to 2.0.7 (#2515) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump rubocop-rails from 2.26.0 to 2.26.1 (#2500) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-s3 from 1.161.0 to 1.162.0 (#2514) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-kms from 1.90.0 to 1.91.0 (#2513) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-core from 3.204.0 to 3.205.0 (#2511) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-s3 from 1.160.0 to 1.161.0 (#2506) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-core from 3.203.0 to 3.204.0 (#2505) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump lockbox from 1.4.0 to 1.4.1 (#2504) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.971.0 to 1.972.0 (#2503) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump net-http-persistent from 4.0.2 to 4.0.4 (#2502) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump oj from 3.16.5 to 3.16.6 (#2501) @dependabot
